# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  common_emitter.cir common_emitter.cir.sh common_emitter_hb.cir common_emitter_hb_contin.cir exclude tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/common_emitter.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND Xyce_USE_FFT AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_573_SON/common_emitter.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} common_emitter.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} common_emitter.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_573_SON/common_emitter.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_573_SON/common_emitter.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;required:fft;hb;loca")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND Xyce_USE_FFT AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_573_SON/common_emitter.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} common_emitter.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} common_emitter.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_573_SON/common_emitter.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_573_SON/common_emitter.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;required:fft;hb;loca")
endif()
